text: Jung In-gi (born September 12, 1966) is a South Korean actor. Jung made his acting debut in 1990, and has remained active in mainstream and independent film as well as television, notably in Jury (2013), The Five (2013) and Gap- dong (2014). == Filmography == === Film === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
